EmailTemplate.name: Batch Upload Managed Payment Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Successful Upload and Creation of Managed Payment records
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Owner} ,
New Managed Payment records in Hive have now been created for the list of sellers uploaded on {!createdDate}
In total, {!countItem} records were created.
Here is list of failed records if any:
{!failedRecords}
Best,
HIVE team
